data.eml:eml: Morphological and molecular diversity of Lake Baikal candonid ostracods, with description of a new genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karanovic, Ivana, Sitnikova, Tatiana Ya. (2017): Morphological and molecular diversity of Lake Baikal candonid ostracods, with description of a new genus. ZooKeys 684: 19-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.684.13249, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.684.13249
